headline: One touch. Perfect coffee. Every morning.
subheadline: The Arco Automatico grinds fresh beans and brews your drink automatically. No measuring, no fuss, no waiting -- just press the button for your favourite drink and walk away.
hero_image_alt: Arco Automatico espresso machine in matte black on a clean light countertop, a single cup of espresso underneath the spout, morning light through a window, the scene calm and uncluttered with nothing else on the counter
description_long: If you've been making pour-over or French press because espresso machines seem too involved, the Automatico will change your mind. It grinds whole beans fresh for every cup -- which is why it tastes dramatically better than pre-ground -- but does it all automatically. Pick your drink on the touchscreen, and the machine handles everything: grinding, tamping, extracting, and cleaning up after itself. The thermoblock heats up rapidly, so there's no warm-up wait. The 8 programmable drink options mean you can save your exact preferences and recreate them with a single touch every morning. This is the machine for people who want exceptional coffee without any of the process. Your morning stays effortless. Your coffee gets a serious upgrade.
use_case_headline: The easiest path to the best coffee you've ever made at home.
use_case_body: Save your preferred drink. Press one button in the morning. The Automatico grinds, brews, and cleans up automatically. Fresh-ground bean coffee with zero effort -- a massive upgrade from capsules, instant, or pre-ground, with zero added complexity.

social_proof_quote.quote: I was a pour-over person who didn't want the fuss of an espresso machine. The Automatico is genuinely easier than my pour-over was -- and the coffee is on another level. One button, fresh beans, perfect drink. It's my favourite thing in the kitchen.
social_proof_quote.name: Lars E.
